rendezvous.translation[0].definitions[0]: an arrangement to meet someone at a particular time and place, often secretly
He made a rendezvous with her in Times Square.
rendezvous.translation[0].definitions[1]: a place where two or more people have arranged to meet
Boats picked us up at pre-arranged rendezvous.
rendezvous.translation[0].definitions[2]: a bar, restaurant etc where people like to meet
a popular rendezvous for media people
rendezvous.translation[1].definitions[0]: to meet someone at a time or place that was arranged earlier
Weâ€™ll rendezvous with James in Nicosia.
rendezvous.translation[1].definitions[1]: if two spacecraft, aircraft, or military vehicles rendezvous, they meet, for example to move supplies from one to the other
